title: surprise party rengar
body:
{{champion:107}}  hello there i am Tiger godyr and i have been playing rengar and i thort would it not be cool to see a surprise party rengar
it would be cool , funny and it would give him a new tip of look.

when he ult a cloud of confetti comes out.

and more 

it would be a cool thing to see

p.s  when i was talking to my mares from the ranked team i'm in about this we all thort it would be cool and it would make people happy and smile when they see it xD 


a big soft thing that jumps out of nowhere to say suprize y not ? 

it will be fun :D

replies.body: When they get leaped upon, Nic Cage's face flashes up and a soundclip from SANIC plays.

> [{quoted}](name=TerenceMckenna2g,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=nELO4QPg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-07T08:58:56.303+0000)
>
> When they get leaped upon, Nic Cage's face flashes up and a soundclip from SANIC plays.

This is a brilliant idea.

hey dude if u are not going to treat things that people have come up with, with respect then wat is the point of people doing this.

just to get poeple like u spit in there face?? 


it just not cool dude. how would u like if someone was doing it to you ??


so yeah just think of what u are saying and if its not nice or if it is negative towards someones thing that they have made just zip it ok ??? 



so yeah 

p.s   this skin would be bad ass iv talked to lots of people about it and there like the idear so

Cant tell if bait or genuinely %%%%%%ed...

Im gonna take the bait cause i feel as if you are more likely %%%%%%ed.

1. at no point was i 'disrespecting' your %%%%ty opinion, its not wrong but it doesnt mean it isnt %%%%ty. 

2. I Think a SPRengar skin would be awesome, your confetti idea sounds good. What i was saying is that you could add what i said to give a real jumpscare, to surprise them, albeit being partly a joke. Seems like you jumped the shark and went on the attack thinking i was talking %%%% when i wasnt.

3. I wasnt spitting in any "poeples" face's you spastic, and even if i could, i wouldnt waste it on insulting you.

4. You talk like a prepubescent, "how would i like it if someone was doing it to [me] ???". One, i wouldnt give two %%%%s, my ego isnt as easily offended as yours seems to be, grow up and learn not everyone thinks the same thing and people are going to disagree with you. If you think that, you truly are an immature kid.
And two, you use that as a way to try and guilt trip me? Please, im past that stage of immaturity where stuff like that works.

5. Your telling me off as if you have already won an argument? Im laughing at you now.

6. Jesus Christ, learn to spell. I cant tell whether your genuinely a %%%%%%ed snotty nosed school kid/ dropout or trying really hard to bait. Both by the way are bad.
"thort" isnt a word, "idear" is not a word, here ill help you. You mean 'thought', as in the past tense of think, and 'idea' which is something you come up with in your head, or head cavity in your case.

7. Please dont use more than one ? or ! in a row. It truly is poor grammar.

But On-Topic, I think a Surpise Party Rengar is a pretty good idea.

> [{quoted}](name=Tiger Godyr,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=nELO4QPg,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-07T02:25:00.865+0000)
>
> {{champion:107}}  hello there i am Tiger godyr and i have been playing rengar and i thort would it not be cool to see a surprise party rengar
> it would be cool , funny and it would give him a new tip of look.
> 
> when he ult a cloud of confetti comes out.
> 
> and more 
> 
> it would be a cool thing to see

so give it some thort plz 

it would be cool to see more surprise party skins 

other people that could have them is someone like

rengar 
talon
evelin
teemo

and some other but i cant think of them :D 

plz give some thort and get back to me play
yeah he has the jump the %%%% out of your seat and cry ult, could work
